content: This potential earnings power includes only projects for which gas rates agreements are in place or expected to be in place after the INGENCO acquisition closes and use what we believe to be a conservative assumption set on revenues with fixed-price volumes only under long-term contracts in place today, at a $1.50 per D3 RIN, $140 per metric ton of LCFS credit, and $3 per MMBtu brown gas pricing on uncontracted volumes, with no impacts from carbon sequestration, carbon intensity reduction initiatives, or high-probability opportunities in our development pipeline.
